attributes.action: Reverse Government support for SMART motorways
attributes.additional_details: We need to stop avoidable deaths and injuries on motorways
attributes.background: 38 people have died on SMART motorways yet Highways England and the Dept of Transport insist they are safe.  It has also been said that they are safer than conventional motorways.  Experts disagree.  The Government should restore the hard shoulder as a life saving feature of all motorways

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban Smart Motorways
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570967

Moratorium and review of "Smart Motorways" and associated works
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549295
